H0.text: who formed the american federation of labor. Eugene V. Debs

H1.text: who formed the american federation of labor. Mary Harris Jones

H2.text: who formed the american federation of labor. John Mitchell

H3.text: who formed the american federation of labor. Samuel Gompers

A4.text: Gompers helped found the Federation of Organized Trades and Labor Unions in 1881 as a coalition of like-minded unions. In 1886 it reorganized into the American Federation of Labor, with Gompers as president.

A5.text: Samuel Gompers was president of the American Federation of Labor from 1886 to 1894, and from 1895 until his death in 1924.
